name: Four (Alex Cooper)
description:
Drive a 4-wheeler (quad) in VR! Explorer hilly terrain and try not to flip. Also try and test your time on the racetrack.

The world is themed around earth! Currently there are 3 main areas: Antarctica, Japan, and Mexico! Each having their own unique features.

There is a racetrack that begins at the Torii (The Japanese Arch), with 2 checkpoints (one at the Japanese - Antarctic border and Antarctic - Mexican border.) You can view your times by looking at the quad's body (look down.)

There are also various paths that you can explorer!

Controls:

Grip each end of the handlebar to grab the handlebar. The right controller's trigger will accelerate, the left controller's trigger will brake/reverse.

2 & w: Move your character up and down on the quad.

Space bar: Reset the quad to spawn.

m: mute music.
